directions: In a large pitcher, combine the tangerine juice, lemon juice and honey. Stir vigorously until the honey is completely dissolved. Add about 2 cups of crushed ice, then slowly pour in the sparkling water. Stir gently.
Fill individual glasses with more ice and pour in the fizz. Garnish each drink with 1 or 2 raspberries and serve immediately. Serves 4 to 6.
, by Sara Kate Gillingham-Ryan (Weldon Owen, Inc., 2010).
ingredients: 2 cups lemon- or raspberry-flavored sparkling water
title: Honey Tangerine Fizz
